articles.title: KPA Command Order Army to Keep High Alert
articles.content:
KPA Command Order Army to Keep High Alert
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army released the following report on Monday as regards the kick-off of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises for aggression by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces:
					 In a statement already issued, a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army strongly demanded the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers stop at once the projected criminal and reckless Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, branding them as war exercises for aggression, test nuclear war maneuvers aimed at mounting a preemptive surprise attack on the DPRK.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces finally launched the joint military exercises for aggression on March 8, defying this just demand of the DPRK.
					
					 Pursuant to the emergency order issued that day, huge armed forces of the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops stationed in south Korea and other overseas bases started to move and the troops of the three services of the puppet forces, local administrative organs, the "Homeland Defense Reserve Forces", the "Civilian Defense Corps", police and military and civilian enterprises of south Korea are ready to go into action all at once.
					
					 Prior to the start of these war maneuvers, the U.S. imperialists deployed many groups of warships including guided-missile destroyers, nuclear-powered submarines and dock landing craft in the east, west and south seas of Korea, and these groups are ready to stage combined naval maneuvers, landing operation exercises and exercises for countering maritime intrusion in coordinated operations with the first, second and third fleets of the south Korean puppet navy.
					
					 Fighter-bombers and pursuit-assault planes are flying into south Korea one after another from their bases in Japan, and flying corps of the U.S. 7th Air Force present in south Korea are staging madcap exercises for intensive strikes at targets in the depth of the DPRK, close air support, air battle and naval support in coordinated operations with flying corps of the puppet air force, inciting a war atmosphere.
					
					 This evermore undisguised adventurous saber-rattling is creating such tense situation on the Korean Peninsula that a war may break out anytime.
					
					 The Supreme Command of the KPA issued the following order to cope with the grave situation prevailing in the country:
					
					1. The men and officers of the KPA on the frontline and coastline and those standing on air guard should reliably defend the outposts of the country so as to repel at a single stroke any attempt of the aggressors to make a preemptive strike.
					
					2. The units of the three services of the KPA should keep themselves fully ready to go into action in order to blow up the citadel of aggressors once the order is issued.
					
					3. All the men and officers of the KPA and the members of the Korean People's Security Forces, the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards should undergo intensive training in the spirit of Mt. Paektu in each drill ground with the will to wipe out the enemy and keep themselves highly alerted to mercilessly crush the aggressors should they intrude into the inviolable sky, land and sea of the DPRK even 0.001 mm.
					
					4. All the people across the country should make a great leap forward in the general charge to build a thriving socialist nation, their hearts burning with hatred against the enemies, each holding a rifle in one hand and a hammer or a sickle in the other.
					
					 The order of the KPA Supreme Command is the most just measure for self-defence to devotedly protect the headquarters of the revolution and the prosperity of the country and the eternal happiness of the people from the reckless moves of the war maniacs for aggression.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK who regard the dignity and sovereignty of the nation as dearer than their own lives will clearly show what miserable end the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers will meet if they dare ignite a war of aggression.

articles.title: Credentials of Chinese Ambassador Accepted
articles.content:
Credentials of Chinese Ambassador Accepted
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People' Assembly, received credentials from Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.
					 After receiving the credentials, Kim conversed with the ambassador.

articles.title: KCNA Releases Report on Construction of Vinalon Factory
articles.content:
KCNA Releases Report on Construction of Vinalon Factory
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il has performed an outstanding exploit by bringing about an epoch-making change in the Juche-oriented vinalon industry true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and the workers of Songun Korea have performed heroic feats by making the mass-production of vinalon an eye-opening reality.  The Korean Central News Agency Monday released a detailed report on the construction of a vinalon factory to get these exploits eternally recorded in the history of building a thriving nation.
					 Referring to the undying leadership provided by the peerlessly great persons for the development of the Juche-oriented vinalon industry, the report said:
					
					 The Juche-oriented vinalon industry was initiated and established by Kim Il Sung with great care.
					
					 Kim Il Sung unrolled a grandiose plan to build the vinalon industry when the Fatherland Liberation War was at its height and personally chose the site for a vinalon factory in the days of the great Chollima upswing in the post-war period. He aroused the whole country to create "vinalon speed" in completing a big city of vinalon industry in a matter of a little over one year.
					
					 He named the precious fiber produced by the efforts of Koreans and with indigenous technology and resources "vinalon," Juche-oriented and national name, and provided field guidance to the factory dozens of times, steering its work at every phase of its development. Under his wise leadership the February 8 Vinalon Complex developed into a large vinalon production center.
					
					 A new history of changes was opened in the vinalon industry in the DPRK in the era of Songun under the patriotic and devoted leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He visited the complex on Feb. 4, Juche 98 (2009), the first year of the drive for a great surge, and gave an order of the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army to complete the construction of the vinalon production process in a matter of one year instead of several years envisaged earlier.
					
					 Early in last February he visited the complex where its modernization was realized at a high level. There he was so pleased with the fact that the complex opened a bright prospect of glorifying the undying exploits of the President and radically improving the people's standard of living that he declared that the success should be celebrated as "a great auspicious event of the whole country."
					
					 Noting that the vinalon industry which had been at a standstill during the "Arduous march", the forced march, was put on a new ultra-modern scientific and technological basis in a brief span of time, the report pointed out that this is the shining fruition of the inexhaustible mental power and the power of ability fully displayed by the workers of the DPRK who have grown stronger hundred times in the crucible of the Songun revolution to defend socialism under the leadership of the Party and the leader.

articles.title: Meeting Marks Centenary of Int'l Women's Day
articles.content:
Meeting Marks Centenary of Int'l Women's Day
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture Monday to mark the centenary of March 8 international women's day.
					 Attending it were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Myong Son, vice-premier of the Cabinet, and leading officials of working people's organizations, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters and women officials, women labor innovators and members of the women's union.
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas Korean women, women of foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here and foreign guests.
					
					 Ro Song Sil, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, said in her report that the unity and solidarity among the progressive women the world over have been boosted in the struggle for national independence and social development against all forms of domination and subjugation and a great stride forward has been made in the development of the women's movement over the past 100 years since the day was set.
					
					 She went on to say:
					
					 The Korean women's movement has covered a path of victory and glory in the crucible of the Korean revolution crowded with heroic events and epoch-making changes under the wise leadership of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung set forth an original idea and theory of the women's movement on the basis of the immortal Juche idea at the very day he embarked upon the road of revolution.
					
					 Kang Pan Sok, indomitable revolutionary fighter, formed the Anti-Japanese Women's Association, the first revolutionary women's organization in Korea, under the guidance of the President, thus giving origin to the glorious Korean women's movement and enabling the Korean women to wage a dynamic struggle united close around the organization.
					
					 The reporter recalled that Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine, played a great pioneer's role in combining the Korean women's emancipation movement with an armed struggle, adding that she helped broad sections of women grow to be mistresses of the country and staunch revolutionaries in the period of building a new country, too.
					
					 The President founded the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, a mass political organization of Korean women and personally worked out the law on sexual equality and promulgated it after the liberation of the country.
					
					 The reporter referred to the undying feats General Secretary Kim Jong Il has performed by training the women as fighters devotedly defending the leader, women revolutionaries in the era of Songun and developing the Korean women's movement into the Juche-oriented women's movement remaining true to the Party's revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 She called upon all the women to fully prepare themselves as women revolutionaries working hard to translate Kim Jong Il's idea for a great surge and his far-reaching plan into realities.

articles.title: Performance Given on Int'l Women's Day
articles.content:
Performance Given on Int'l Women's Day
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by artistes of national art troupes at the People's Palace of Culture Monday to celebrate the centenary of International Women's Day.
					 Among the audience were senior Party and state officials, leading officials of working people's organizations, female officials and labor innovators and members of the women's union.
					
					 Present there were overseas Korean women, women of foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here and foreign guests.
					
					Artistes in such numbers as male solo "My Mother", an immortal classic masterpiece, female solo and pangchang "May Festival in Taoquanli", solo dance "I See the Victory of Revolution" sang high praises of the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese heroine
						 Kim Jong Suk for the country and revolution and the cause of women's emancipation and impressively represented the staunch revolutionary faith of the anti-Japanese women fighters.
					
					Put on the stage were numbers depicting the faith and will of the Korean women to energetically push one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot, remaining loyal to the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Protection Enforced in DPRK for Working Women
articles.content:
Protection Enforced in DPRK for Working Women
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The women of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea lead an independent and creative life with equal socio-political rights with men. 
					 It can be found in the legal measures taken by the state for the women's health and labor protection. 
					
					 According to the labor law of the Republic, it is not permitted to assign arduous and harmful labor affected by severe vibration, coldness, traction, heavy loading and diving to women and put pregnant women or nursing mothers on night work.
					
					 The state keeps labor protection arrangements, sanitary facilities, consultation offices, nurseries, kindergartens and children's wards available at working places of women to protect and improve their and their children's health and encourage women to take an active part in social labor.
					
					 Women workers with three children or more under thirteen work less than other workers in time but get the same payment.
					
					 In addition to the regular and extra vacations, working women are entitled to maternity leave.
					
					 The special labor protection is a token of the state's deep concern for the working women.
					
					 The Korean women enjoy not only the legal measures but preferential treatment and respect in society.

articles.title: DPRK Boasts of Many Heroines
articles.content:
DPRK Boasts of Many Heroines
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The women of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are significantly celebrating the centenary of the International Women's Day, March 8.
					 Under the loving care of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, peerlessly great men, lots of women have grown to be heroines in the country.
					
					 Following the spirit of heroic struggle displayed by the anti-Japanese women fighters, Jo Ok Hui, Thae Son Hui, An Yong Ae, Ri Su Dok and many other women rendered distinguished military services in the Fatherland Liberation War to win the title of Hero of the Republic.
					
					 Quite a few heroines were also produced in the periods of socialist construction and the second grand advance of Chollima with Ri Sin Ja, Kil Hwak Sil, Jong Song Ok, Hyon Yong Ra and Pak Ok Hui as models.
					
					  Scores of women have become heroines in the country in the new century alone.
					
					 Among them are heroic mothers such as So Hye Suk and Ri Hui Sun and those who distinguished themselves in education, science, literature and the arts and sports.
					
					 The Korean women are leading a worthwhile life with due status in society thanks to Kim Jong Il, who bestows all benefits on them.

articles.title: Int'l Women's Day Editorially Observed
articles.content:
Int'l Women's Day Editorially Observed
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Leading papers Monday editorially observe the centenary of the March 8 International Women's Day.
					 The International Women's Day is the day of the working women struggling for peace, democracy, national independence and the cause of socialism, opposed to imperialism, and a militant holiday to boost the international solidarity among the women the world over in their actions for their equality and rights and demonstrate their might.
					
					Rodong Sinmun says: The noble ideal of the March 8 International Women's Day was successfully realized and a shining success made in the settlement of the women's problem and the development of the women's movement under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and President
						 Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The President regarded the women as a powerful force pushing one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot at the very day he embarked on the road of the revolution in his early years, thus making a glorious history of the Juche-oriented women's movement.
					
					 Right after the liberation of the country, he founded the Democratic Women's Union of Korea and promulgated the law on sex equality. This marked a historic milestone in the development of the women's movement in the country.
					
					The women's movement the President started and led to victory has greeted a new heyday in its development under the outstanding and tested leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The women in the DPRK exercised their legitimate sovereign rights, being responsible for the state and the society even when socialism collapsed in different countries and the international women's movement suffered setbacks, demonstrating high dignity and honor. This would be unthinkable without the experienced and tested leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The women in the DPRK fully enjoy an independent and creative life with equal socio-political rights with men as the mistress of the country.
					
					 They will as ever strengthen friendship and solidarity with all the progressive women aspiring after independence and carry on a vigorous struggle to build an independent world free from domination and subjugation in order to ensure global peace and the happiness of the women and their children. 
					
					 Minju Joson says that immensely rosy is the future of the Korean women's movement under the leadership of Kim Jong Il. It calls on all the women to single-mindedly unite around him and struggle more dynamically to win a victory in the drive for building a thriving nation and thus demonstrate the revolutionary stamina of the Korean women in the era of Songun before the world.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Japan's Moves to Become Military Power
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Japan's Moves to Become Military Power
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Japan "Self- Defense Forces" staged together with the U.S. forces stationed in Japan large-scale joint exercises to cope with a "contingency."
					 Involved in the exercise staged in the Kadena U.S. air force base in Okinawa were dozens of planes including those in the base and fighter planes of the U.S. forces in their mainland and south Korea and various other parts of Japan and the "Air Self-Defense Force". This was reported to be the largest-ever held in the base.
					
					 Timed to coincide with the exercises, the Ministry of Defence newly deployed a tanker for refueling helicopters in midair in ASDF. C-130 specially improved to refuel copters in flight was deployed in the Komaki base of ASDF on Feb. 25.
					
					 These facts indicate that Japan has become all the more frantic in its moves to emerge a military giant under the signboard of "defence".
					
					  It is long since the spirit of "the Pacifist Constitution" demised in Japan. It has already acquired military potential and offensive forces as strong as military powers.
					
					 It is the view of Japan that "it suffered a defeat in the Second World War as it was weak in its force." It is, therefore, bolstering up its SDF as armed forces for overseas aggression after setting it as its policy goal and strategic line to emerge a military power. 
					
					 SDF is openly making a switchover in its strategy from the "exclusive defence of Japan's proper" to "overseas attack" and the daily growing military muscle of Japan has already gone beyond the mission of "self-defence," seriously threatening the security of East Asia.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries make no scruple of making any dangerous military collusion and nexus with aggressor forces with a view to achieving their goal of reinvasion. They are beefing up the strength of SDF for aggression by spending a stupendous amount of funds every year. 
					
					 The DPRK is made the primary target of their military action for aggression.
					
					 It is the invariable ambition of Japan to launch military reinvasion of Korea and pave the way for dominating the world.
					
					 They have concentrated troops of SDF on their Western coastal area close to the Korean Peninsula under the pretext of "threat" from the DPRK, ceaselessly staging various forms of war exercises for aggression against it. 
					
					 The desperate moves of the Japanese reactionaries to launch overseas aggression, oblivious of the lesson taught by the last century, are criminal acts against history as they go against the trend of independence and peace in the new century and stand in the way of social progress and development.
					
					 It is impossible to achieve global peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Asia and the world and the horrible disasters in the last century may repeat themselves unless Japan's moves for overseas aggression are checked and frustrated.
					
					 The people of Northeast Asia and the rest of the world are called upon to heighten their vigilance against Japan's military moves.
					
					  Japan would be well advised to stop at once its moves to emerge a military power, mindful that its way of becoming a war state will lead to its final destruction.

articles.title: Stern Punishment of S. Korean Regime Called for
articles.content:
Stern Punishment of S. Korean Regime Called for
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The forthcoming "election to local self-governing bodies" in south Korea will certainly prove to be people's court for meting out stern punishment to the regime of traitors. Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 With no trick can the conservative group evade the stern judgment by the south Korean people for the treachery they have committed during the past two years of their office, away from "election commitments".
					
					 The south Korean rulers offered everything to their American master while claiming the theory of "prioritizing the relations with the U.S.", thus forcing south Korea to fall victim to the U.S. policy of aggression and plunder. They make no scruple of committing such treachery as opening south Korean markets to American beef infected with mad cow disease in return for "tightened alliance" with the U.S. and conclusion of humiliating "Free Trade Agreement". 
					
					 The south Korean rulers forced enterprises to launch "restructuring" and "layoff" and pushed medium and small enterprises into bankruptcy en masse in active pursuance of the "neo-liberal economic policy" under the signboard of "pragmatism". The group of traitors preoccupied with dependence on foreign forces busied themselves visiting other countries to beg for foreign capital allegedly to "control economic crisis" and drastically extended the term of exemption of taxes for foreign enterprises, thus introducing foreign monopoly capital to south Korea at random and leaving its economy to the tender mercy of foreign forces. 
					
					 The conservative group had firmly committed themselves to pushing forward the "plan of building Sejong City" before the "presidential election" to win people's favor. But they reneged on their commitment and are pressing for a "draft amendment to the plan of building Sejong City", deceiving people again. 
					
					 The south Korean people can no longer be taken in by the present rulers which turned their backs on the people. The evermore intensified struggle of south Koreans against the "government" is the demonstration of their will never to tolerate the unpopular misrule of the group of traitors, the article concludes.

articles.title: Struggle for Independence Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Independence Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a statement on Monday, the 91st anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising, calling for the struggle for independence against foreign forces.
					 The statement said that the March First Popular Uprising taught the truth that if the colonial rule by outside forces is not terminated, anyone cannot get rid of the lot of slavery and all the people should turn out to realize national independence.
					
					 Cherishing this truth, we will certainly frustrate the moves for reviving militarism of Japan, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation, and its ambition for staging a comeback to Korea and beat back with the concerted efforts of the fellow countrymen the U.S. imperialists who are getting hell-bent on the moves for permanent division of Korea and a nuclear war while committing all sorts of crimes against the Korean nation, the statement stressed.
					
					 It called upon the people from all walks of life to wage a dynamic movement for independent reunification under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: Joint Military Exercises Flailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Joint Military Exercises Flailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea made public a statement on March 6 demanding the United States and the south Korean puppet warmongers cancel their plan for war maneuvers for aggression on the DPRK.
					 Referring to the fact that the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises planned by the U.S. and the south Korean bellicose forces are arousing serious concern at home and abroad, the statement said that the exercises, to be staged under war scenarios including "OPLAN 5027" aimed at a preemptive attack on the DPRK, are evidently a saber-rattling against it.
					
					 To put an end to the war crisis and achieve peace on the Korean Peninsula is the desire of the entire nation and the task of the times which brooks no further delay, it said, urging the U.S. to cancel the plan for the joint military exercises and opt for concluding a peace treaty.
					
					 Earlier on March 5, the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a statement bitterly denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet authorities for their scheme to plunge the Korean nation into disasters of a nuclear war through the disgusting joint military exercises.
					
					 The Pastors' Council for Realizing Justice and Peace, the Missionary Solidarity Council of Christian Society and other Christian organizations of south Korea called a press conference outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on March 4 in protest against the projected exercises.

articles.title: Suppression of Korean Students in Japan Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Korean Students in Japan Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification released a statement on March 5 denouncing the Japanese government for its suppression of Korean students in Japan.
					 Recalling that the Japanese government is seeking to exclude only the Korean schools from the "tuition-free program for senior high schools" when the group of ultra-right gangsters is these days becoming all the more brutal in the outrage against Korean students in Japan, the statement condemned this scheme as a deed of further encouraging the shameless terrorist action.
					
					 Such developments are an extension of the smear campaign the Japanese authorities have so far persistently staged against the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and their politically-motivated suppression of Koreans in Japan, it charged, declaring that all the Koreans will certainly force Japan, the sworn enemy, to make an apology and reparation for its past crimes and suppression of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 It called upon all the people to extend positive support to the struggle of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and vigorously fight to check Japan's scheme for revival of militarism and liquidate the pro-Japanese sycophantic and treacherous forces.

articles.title: Wrong Behavior of Japanese Government Protested
articles.content:
Wrong Behavior of Japanese Government Protested
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Korean residents in Japan including those concerned of the Korean schools strongly protested against the Japanese government's attempt to exclude the Korean schools in Japan from the "tuition-free program for senior high schools".
					 The headmaster of Ibaraki Korean Primary and Senior High School called a press conference at the Ibaraki prefectural government on Mar. 2 and made public a statement.
					
					 The statement expressed the resentment at the fact that the Japanese government openly showed the attitude of national discrimination when such cases as making violent actions and words against innocent Korean students in Japan have been reported one after another.
					
					 It is an unjust national discrimination and violation of human rights, contrary to the international convention on human rights and the spirit of the Japanese constitution to intentionally exclude the Korean schools from the "tuition-free program for senior high schools", it said, urging the Japanese authorities to refrain from violating the rights of the Korean students in Japan to learning.
					
					 The managing director of Aichi Korean Academy, the chairman of the Educational Society of Aichi Korean Senior High School and parents of students of Korean schools visited the Japanese Diet building on Mar. 4 to present a written request for the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology.
					
					 In the request they mentioned the details of the establishment of Korean schools, the conditions of their operation, the contents of education at those schools, etc. and held that any discriminative action should never be taken in relation to the issue of rights to education.
					
					 On the same day representatives of the schools including the managing director of Kanagawa Korean Academy and the headmaster of Kanagawa Korean Senior High School went to the Kanagawa Prefectural General Branch of the Japanese Democratic Party to deliver a written request to the party.
					
					 The request noted that Kanagawa Korean Senior High School has been run so far according to the laws and regulations of the local administration just like other foreign schools.
					
					 If the Japanese government finally excludes only the Korean schools from the "program" despite the said fact, this will be evidently crackdown upon the Korean schools, it stressed.
					
					 The headmaster and students of Tokyo Korean Senior High School and their parents said in their written request to the New Komeito Party of Japan that it is unjust behavior, in view of the educational idea and results of the Korean schools with the history of over half a century, to exclude them from the "program".

articles.title: Seminar on Juche Philosophy Held in Romania
articles.content:
Seminar on Juche Philosophy Held in Romania
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A seminar under the subject of "The Juche philosophy and
					 Kim Jong Il" took place at the building of the Socialist Party of Romania on Feb. 27.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the party and chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Romania, said at the seminar that the Juche philosophy is great as it elucidated the man-centered viewpoint and attitude toward the world and gave the masses of people a powerful weapon for transforming the world and carving out their destinies.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il has carried forward and developed the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and enforced the original Songun politics based on it, thus turning the DPRK into a powerful socialist country of Juche which no formidable enemy dares provoke, he noted.
					
					 The chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Bucharest at the seminar said with high appreciation that Kim Jong Il has correctly indicated the way for realizing the popular masses' cause of independence through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 The Juche philosophy is arousing the support and sympathy from among the world people while being widely disseminated in many countries for its originality and validity, he said, stressing it is only the Juche philosophy that should be regarded as guideline by the progressive mankind aspiring after independence at present.

articles.title: Joint Military Exercises Flayed in Other Countries
articles.content:
Joint Military Exercises Flayed in Other Countries
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association and the Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia issued statements on March 3 in denunciation of the war moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces.
					 The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association in its statement branded the projected U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises as a serious threat to the peace of the Korean Peninsula and a dangerous saber-rattling which might spark off a nuclear war.
					
					 The growing danger of war on the Korean Peninsula is totally contrary to the DPRK's efforts for detente and durable peace and its proposal for concluding a peace treaty in particular, it pointed out, saying that the reality goes to prove that the U.S. is seeking confrontation and war rather than dialogue and peace.
					
					 The Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia in the statement expressed full support for the tough stand of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army that it will counter the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers with strong military action if they stage the joint military exercises.
					
					 It held that the U.S. and the south Korean military should revoke the projected exercises at once and the U.S. should conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK at an early date for durable peace on the peninsula.

articles.title: Joint Military Exercises Flayed Overseas Korean
articles.content:
Joint Military Exercises Flayed Overseas Korean
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Jo Yun Hae, chairman of the Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, issued a statement titled "The U.S. and the south Korean bellicose forces should stop the scheme for a war at once" on March 4.
					 The statement denounced as war exercises aimed at preemptive attack on the DPRK Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises to be staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppets from March 8.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are planning to launch the war exercises for aggression in collusion with the puppet warmongers at a time when the DPRK proposed to start the talks for replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty, it noted, branding this as a criminal move that poses a grave threat to the sovereignty and dignity of a sovereign state and drives the situation of the Korean Peninsula to a crisis.
					
					 It demanded that the U.S. and the south Korean puppets behave themselves, facing up to the trend of the times and stop the projected exercises for aggression at once.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- One day in June Juche 52 (1963) President Kim Il Sung, who had always been concerned for supplying people with more eggs, asked an official to bring him chicken and duck eggs, some 200 respectively.
					 After receiving them, he put salted water into two large porcelain pots and soaked the chicken and duck eggs separately in the water.
					
					 Not aware of the President's intention, the official tried to stop him from doing such a trifling work.
					
					 With a broad smile on his face, however, the President said he would do everything for the people and went on with his work.
					
					 Fifteen days later the official was summoned again by the President and offered salt-cured eggs to taste.
					
					 The President asked how did he like them.
					
					 With him saying they tasted good, the President said that they were the eggs he preserved with salted water in the pots and that officials of poultry farming should be informed of the method.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il participa en el mitin por inauguracion de Fabrica de Vinalon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il participa en el mitin por inauguracion de Fabrica de Vinalon
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar solemnemente el mitin de la ciudad de Hamhung para festejar la inauguracion de la moderna Fabrica de Vinalon, que significo un gran jubilo nacional. 
					Esa urbe estuvo ese dia en el ambiente de fiesta. 
					
					En la Plaza de Hamhung y las aceras contiguas estaban conglomerados cientos de miles de ciudadanos que portaban ramos de flores en sus manos.
					
					Estuvo presente en ese acto multitudinario el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Respondiendo cordialmente a las aclamaciones de la multitud, el Dirigente dio calidas felicitaciones a los ciudadanos de Hamhung incluso los obreros del Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero quienes realizaron relevantes meritos laborales en la construccion de la moderna Fabrica de Vinalon.  
					
					Participaron tambien los cuadros del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito como Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yong Chun, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Choe Yong Rim, Hong Sok Hyong, Kim Ki Nam, Kim Jong Gak y Kim Il Chol, el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea Kim Yong Dae, los vicepremieres del Consejo de Ministros, los secretarios responsables de todos los comites provinciales del PTC, los funcionarios directivos del Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero, los heroes e innovadores laborales de la ciudad de Hamhung. 
					
					Fueron invitados los funcionarios directivos de los organos del Partido y el Poder, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los funcionarios directivos y los benemeritos de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur y de la ciudad de Hamhung.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Thae Jong Su. 
					
					El orador dijo que la gran victoria de vinalon, que hizo vibrar a todo el pais de emocion y jubilo, es el valioso producto del poderio de la unidad monolitica de la Corea del Songun, donde el dirigente y el pueblo se confian mutuamente y este apoya absolutamente a aquel, y de la inagotable potencia espiritual del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos que estan llenos de la fuerte dignidad nacional, el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza y tenaz lucha y del noble amor y abnegacion por el futuro.
					
					Ese evento extraordinario -continuo- que conmovio a todo el mundo, manifesto plenamente el poderio inagotable de la economia independiente de la Corea del Songun que conquista las tecnologias de punta contemplando el nivel mundial, y exalto a todo el mundo el aspecto valiente de la heroica clase obrera coreana que avanza como torrente hacia la victoria de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera rechazando tajantemente cualesquier maniobras de los imperialistas tendentes a aislar y atropellar a Corea. 
					
					Nuestro partido es poderoso, nuestra patria socialista es inexpugnable y la victoria final de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera es definitiva porque contamos con la invencible direccion del Songun del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, con el gran contingente de la heroica clase obrera como los obreros del Complejo de Vinalon infinitamente fieles a la causa del Partido y con la firme base de la economia nacional independiente, apunto.
					
					Al pronunciar las palabras de felicitacion, el gerente del Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek, Ri Hi Hon, y la presidenta de la Junta Administrativa de la Granja Cooperativa de Tongbong del distrito de Hamju, Ri Yong Ae, exhortaron a los militantes del partido y los trabajadores de todo el pais que unidos mas compactamente en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion encabezada por el Dirigente, avancen mas valiente, mas rapido y a lo mas alto con la indoblegable potencia espiritual y el modo de trabajo de los heroes del Complejo de Vinalon en todos los sectores de construccion de la potencia economica, para entrar dignamente en la plaza de festejo de octubre (mes de fundacion del PTC) con el parte de orgullosa victoria a ser dado a este Partido maternal.

articles.title: Publicada informacion detallada de la ATCC sobre fabrica de vinalon
articles.content:
ublicada informacion detallada de la ATCC sobre fabrica de vinalon
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ATCC) -- La Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea publico el dia 8 la informacion detallada sobre la construccion de la Fabrica de Vinalon para transmitir eternamente en la historia de la gran potencia prospera las hazanas extraordinarias del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien trajo un cambio estupendo en la autoctona industria de vinalon en acato al legado del Presidente
					 Kim Il Sung, y los meritos heroicos de la clase obrera coreana de la era del Songun que propicio la maravillosa avalancha de vinalon.
					 La nota da a conocer la inmortal direccion de esos Grandes Hombres sin pares, impregnada en la autoctona industria de vinalon, en las siguientes lineas:
					
					 La autoctona industria de vinalon fue explorada y fundada bajo la guia del Presidente Kim Il Sung, patriota sin par.
					
					 El Presidente, quien trazo el magno proyecto de la construccion de la industria de vinalon en plena guerra coreana, determino personalmente el terreno de la fabrica en el periodo posbelico del gran auge Chollima y movilizo a todo el pais de modo que fuera creada la "velocidad de vinalon" con que se levanto la gran ciudad de vinalon en un ano y pico.
					
					 Denomino esa fibra preciosa hecha con las fuerzas, tecnicas y recursos nacionales como "vinalon" jucheano y nacional y dirigio sobre el terreno decenas de veces la fabrica de vinalon. Gracias a la sabia y minuciosa direccion del Presidente, el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero se fortalecio y se convirtio en la gran base productora de vinalon.
					
					Bajo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il caracterizada por la abnegacion patriotica, nuestra industria de vinalon abrio la nueva historia de su cambio en la epoca del Songun.
					
					 El 4 de febrero del 98 (2009) de la Era Juche, primer ano del gran auge, el Dirigente emitio la orden del Comandante Supremo de terminar la construccion de los procesos productivos de vinalon no en varios anos como lo planeado sino dentro de un ano.
					
					A principios de febrero de 2010, el Dirigente visito el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero modernizado en el alto nivel y declaro a todo el mundo la produccion cuantiosa de esa fibra como "gran jubilo de todo el pais" poniendose tan complacido de que esto pudiera glorificar las imborrables hazanas del Presidente y abrir firmes perspectivas del mejoramiento trascendental de la vida del pueblo.
					
					La industria de vinalon que habia sido apagada en el periodo de la "Marcha penosa", la forzada, se ha levantado nuevamente en un corto plazo sobre la base cientifico-tecnica de punta.
					
					 Esto deviene el orgulloso resultado de la gran explosion del indoblegable poderio espiritual y la capacidad ejecutiva de nuestros obreros que se hicieron cien veces mas fuertes en el fragor de la revolucion del Songun para defender el socialismo bajo la direccion del partido y el lider.

articles.title: Vocero en Phanmunjom advierte por caso de maniobras militares conjuntas
articles.content:
Vocero en Phanmunjom advierte por caso de maniobras militares conjuntas
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ATCC) -- El portavoz de la Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom hizo publica el dia 7 una declaracion con motivo de que Estados Unidos y las autoridades surcoreanas entraron por fin en el camino de ejecutar los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" que apuntan a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 El despliegue de esas maniobras conjuntas vuelven a demostrar claramente que EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas son los perturbadores de la paz y los belicistas que estan buscando una guerra en este territorio, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					 Frente a la situacion dada, bajo la autorizacion, la Representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom declara lo siguiente:
					
					 Nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias no se comprometeran por mas tiempo al Acuerdo de Armisticio y al Acuerdo de No Agresion Norte-Sur.
					
					 Puesto que una parte beligerante dio a la quiebra el Acuerdo de Armisticio y una parte del dialogo abandono el Acuerdo de No Agresion, no hay razon por la cual debemos ser unicos restringidos por ellos.
					
					 Desde ahora, nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias ejerceran dignamente segun sus decisiones su poderio de autodefensa sin ser restringidas en nada.
					
					 Ya que los presentes ejercicios militares conjuntos son calificados de entrenamiento para la guerra nuclear y de agresion a la RPDC, sera suspendido inevitablemente el proceso de desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y se vera fortalecido mas y mas nuestro disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa.
					
					 Responder con el potente disuasivo nuclear de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias a los medios de ataque nuclear de EE.UU. que amenazan el mar, el cielo y el territorio bajo nuestra jurisdiccion so pretexto de los ejercicios militares conjuntos, esto es el derecho a la autodefensa que nadie puede impedir.
					
					 Ya que la contraparte se abalanza sobre nuestro pais, nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias tomaran el camino de ejercer la implacable fuerza fisica aunque les son muy preciosas la paz, la reconciliacion y cooperacion nacionales.
					
					 Nuestra decision consiste en ajustar la cuenta final midiendo la fuerza militar de frente a frente si ellos no desean la concertacion del convenio de paz ni les gustan la reconciliacion y la cooperacion.
					
					 Mientras continuen los ejercicios belicos contra la RPDC, se daran a la ruptura todos los dialogos militares entre la RPDC y EE.UU. y entre ambas partes de Corea.
					
					  Resultara absurdo debatir sobre la "paz" y la "cooperacion" con la contraparte que trae el nubarron de guerra nuclear apuntandonos con el fusil.
					
					  EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas deben tomar en cuenta que sus imprudentes acciones militares no les daran otro resultado que la gran verguenza y la ruina.

articles.title: Comandancia Suprema emite orden  frente a situacion proxima a Guerra
articles.content:
Comandancia Suprema emite orden  frente a situacion proxima a guerra
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ATCC) -- En relacion con que los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos iniciaron los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" de caracter agresivo, la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 8 la siguiente informacion:
					En su declaracion publicada anteriormente, el portavoz del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea demando fuertemente a los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos desistir de inmediato de los imprudentes y criminales ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" calificandolos de maniobras previas a la guerra de agresion y de ensayo de guerra nuclear para atacar sorpresivamente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 A pesar de esto, los yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos iniciaron por fin el dia 8 esos ejercicios militares desoyendo nuestra justa demanda.
					
					 Este dia, al emitirse la orden de emergencia, comenzaron a moverse las colosales tropas agresoras norteamericanas acampadas en el Sur de Corea y en ultramar y entraron simultaneamente en el estado de movilizacion combativa las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas, organos administrativos locales, el "ejercito de reserva local", el "cuerpo de defensa civil", la policia, las empresas belicas y civiles del Sur de Corea.
					
					 Con anterioridad, los imperialistas norteamericanos emplazaron muchas flotillas de guerra formadas por el destructor con proyectil teledirigido, el submarino nuclear, el buque de desembarco con dique, etc. en los Mares Este, Oeste y Sur de Corea.
					
					 Ellas estan listas para movilizarse en el ejercicio combinado de traslado en el mar, el de la operacion de desembarco y el de penetracion por el mar en cooperacion con las flotas No. 1, 2 y 3 de las fuerzas navales titeres del Sur de Corea.
					
					 Por otra parte, llegan uno tras otro los cazabombarderos y los aviones de asalto procedentes de las bases en Japon, y las escuadrillas de la Septima Fuerza Aerea norteamericana ocupante del Sur de Corea fomentan el ambiente de guerra librando freneticamente los ejercicios de golpe concentrado a los blancos en la profundidad, el apoyo aereo cercano, el combate aereo y el apoyo a las fuerzas navales en cooperacion con las aviaciones de las fuerzas aereas titeres del Sur de Corea.
					
					 Debido a esos aventureros ejercicios belicos que se tornan cada dia mas desenfrenados, esta dandose ahora en la Peninsula Coreana una situacion muy tirante que puede desatar la guerra en cualquier momento.
					
					 Frente a la grave situacion creada en el pais, la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea emitio la siguiente orden:
					
					1.   A todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC que cumplen la mision de guardar y vigilar el frente, el mar y el cielo, defiendan con toda seguridad la primera linea del frente de la patria para frustrar de un solo golpe cualquier maniobra provocativa de los agresores encaminada al ataque preventivo.
					
					2.   A las unidades terrestres, maritimas y aereas del EPC, adopten la perfecta disposicion combativa para arrasar el bastion de los agresores cuando sea dada la orden.
					
					3.   A todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los miembros de la Guarnicion Popular de Corea, la Guardia Roja Obrero-Campesina y la Guardia Juvenil Roja, realicen intensamente el entrenamiento con el espiritu del Paektu en todos los campos habilitados para este fin asumiendo la disposicion de aniquilar a los enemigos y mantenganse en el maximo estado de alerta para exterminar despiadadamente a los provocadores si estos agresores invaden, aunque fuera 0.001 mm, el cielo, la tierra y el mar sagrados de la RPDC.
					
					4.   A los habitantes de todo el pais, levanten la oleada de grandes saltos en la ofensiva general para construir una gran potencia prospera socialista con el fusil en una mano y la hoz y el martillo en la otra ardiendo de odio hacia los enemigos.
					
					 La orden de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC constituye la mas justa medida autodefensiva para defender a costa de la vida a la Direccion de la Revolucion y garantizar la prosperidad de la patria y la eterna felicidad del pueblo desde las imprudentes maniobras agresivas de los maniacos de guerra.
					
					Nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, que aprecian mas que su vida a la dignidad y la soberania nacionales, mostraran claramente como sera el fin de los provocadores si los imperialistas  yanquis y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos se atreven a desatar la guerra de agresion.

articles.title: Se acredita ante Kim Yong Nam el nuevo embajador chino
articles.content:
Se acredita ante Kim Yong Nam el nuevo embajador chino
 Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ATCC) -- Liu Hongcai presento el dia 8 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, las cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular China en Corea.
					 Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Periodicos conmemoran centenario del Dia Internacional de la Mujer
articles.content:
Periodicos conmemoran centenario del Dia Internacional de la Mujer
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos difundieron en sus ediciones de este lunes los editoriales dedicados al centenario del Dia Internacional de la Mujer (8 de marzo).
					 Este dia es el de la lucha de las trabajadoras contra el imperialismo y por la paz, la democracia, la independencia nacional y la causa socialista y la fiesta combativa en que se fortalece la solidaridad internacional de las mujeres de todo el mundo por la igualdad y los derechos y se manifiesta su poderio, comienza el diario Rodong Sinmun y prosigue:
					
					 En Corea, bajo la sabia direccion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el lider, se materializo magnificamente el noble ideal de lucha del Dia Internacional de la Mujer y se logro una victoria brillante en la solucion del problema de la mujer y en el desarrollo del movimiento femenino.
					
					 El Presidente Kim Il Sung dio inicio a la gloriosa historia del autoctono movimiento femenino considerando a las mujeres desde el principio de sus actividades revolucionarias como poderosas fuerzas a cargo de empujar una rueda de la revolucion.
					
					 Inmediatamente despues de la liberacion del pais (15 de agosto de 1945), el fundo la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea y proclamo la Ley de Igualdad de Derechos del Hombre y la Mujer, hechos que marcaron un importante hito historico para el desarrollo del movimiento femenino de nuestro pais.
					
					 Este movimiento iniciado y conducido al triunfo por el Presidente acogio el nuevo periodo de su desarrollo bajo la destacada y probada guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Aun cuando ha sido frustrado el socialismo en varios paises y atravesaba duras pruebas el movimiento femenino internacional, las coreanas vivieron muy dignas y orgullosas ejerciendo plenamente sus derechos independientes como duenas del Estado y la sociedad.  
					
					 Esto no se puede imaginar sin la veterana y diestra orientacion del Dirigente.
					
					 En Corea las mujeres viven de manera independiente y creativa teniendo los mismos derechos socio-politicos que los hombres.
					
					 En el futuro tambien, las coreanas fortaleceran la amistad y la solidaridad con todas las mujeres progresistas aspirantes a la independencia y lucharan energicamente por la paz mundial y la felicidad de las mujeres y los ninos y por construir un mundo independiente donde no haya la dominacion ni la subyugacion.
					
					 Por su parte, el periodico Minju Joson enfatiza que es muy maravilloso el futuro del movimiento femenino de Corea que avanza bajo la guia del Dirigente.
					
					Exhorta a luchar con mas vigor, unidas monoliticamente en torno al Dirigente, por la victoria de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera para demostrar a todo el mundo el impetu revolucionario de las coreanas de la epoca del Songun.

articles.title: ATCC comenta maniobras de Japon para potencia militar
articles.content:
ATCC comenta maniobras de Japon para potencia militar
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ATCC) -- Hace poco, las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa de Japon" desarrollaron en la base aerea norteamericana de Kadena en Okinawa junto con las tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en su pais los ejercicios conjuntos de gran envergadura para hacer frente al "tiempo de emergencia".
					 En la ocasion participaron decenas de aviones, entre ellos, las aeronaves pertenecientes a esta base y los cazas de las tropas norteamericanas con bases en EE.UU., el Sur de Corea y varios lugares de Japon y de las "fuerzas aereas de autodefensa".
					
					 Dicen que este entrenamiento tiene la mayor envergadura en comparacion con los anteriores ejercicios realizados en el pasado en esa base aerea.
					
					 Por otra parte, el Ministerio de Defensa ubico nuevamente el 25 de febrero el avion de transporte "C-130" transformado particularmente para suministrar la gasolina en el aire a los helicopteros en la base de Komaki de las "fuerzas aereas de autodefensa".
					
					  Los hechos insinuan que este pais isleno da mas acicate a las maniobras por su conversion en la potencia militar bajo el rotulo de la "defensa".
					
					  Hoy dia, ya hace mucho tiempo que desaparecio el espiritu de la "Constitucion de Paz" en Japon, y este posee la potencialidad militar y las fuerzas armadas de ataque comparables con las potencias militares.
					
					  El pais isleno, que busca en la "la debilidad de la fuerza la causa de su derrota en la Segunda Guerra Mundial", fortalece las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" como las de agresion a ultramar presentando su conversion en la potencia militar como meta politica y linea estrategica.
					
					  Las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon aceleran abiertamente la transformacion del "tipo de la defensa del territorio" al de "ataque a ultramar". Tambien, el poderio militar de Japon, que se libero ya hace mucho tiempo de su mision de la "autodefensa" y se expande cada dia mas, amenaza gravemente la seguridad de la region del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					Para alcanzar el objeto de nueva agresion, los reaccionarios japoneses realizan cualquier conspiracion militar peligrosa con las fuerzas agresivas y fortalecen las fuerzas armadas de agresion de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" malgastando cada ano gran suma de dinero como gastos militares.
					
					 El primer blanco de las acciones militares agresivas de esos reaccionarios es precisamente la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 Es invariable la ambicion de Japon de perpetrar la nueva agresion militar a Corea y de abrir la puerta para la heguemonia mundial.
					
					 Bajo el pretexto de la supuesta "amenaza" de la RPDC Japon emplazo concentradamente sus fuerzas armadas en la costa occidental cercana a la Peninsula Coreana y desarrolla sin cesar los ejercicios belicos de caracter agresivo de toda indole contra la RPDC.
					
					 Tales maniobras desesperadas encaminadas a tomar el camino de la agresion a ultramar olvidandose de las lecciones del siglo pasado, devienen un acto criminal antihistorico que detiene la corriente de la independencia y paz del nuevo siglo, el progreso y desarrollo sociales. 
					
					 Sin frenar y frustrar las maniobras de Japon para invadir a otros paises, no podran preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana, Asia y el resto del mundo, sino se podra repetir la catastrofe ensangrentada del siglo pasado.
					
					 El circulo social internacional incluido el Nordeste Asiatico debera mantener la alta vigilancia ante los movimientos militares de Japon.
					
					 Este pais isleno debe abandonar de inmediato sus maquinaciones para la conversion de su pais en la potencia militar teniendo presente que el camino hacia el Estado belico es precisamente la ruina.
